InnerRadius: min distance between point and context
OuterRadius: max distance between point and context
PointsPerRing: number of items to generate for each ring
ArcDirection: If you generate items on a piece of circle you define direction of Arc cut here
ArcAngle: If you generate items on a piece of circle you define angle of Arc cut here
bUseSpiralPattern:
If true, the rings of the wheel will be rotated in a spiral pattern.  If false, they will all be at a zero
rotation, looking more like the spokes on a wheel.
